args: Hello, Sheila. What are you doing here?
I borrowed the castle kitchen to make you\na little late-night treat.
I hope it's not too sweet.
It IS rather sweet—but also delicious.
Was I...dreaming about the past?\nHmm...I could make that again...
Hello, Sheila. Did you need something?
A crème brûlée? Ah, but this brings\nback memories.
Hee hee! That's the same thing you said\nto me the first time I made it.
Well, that does seem rather like me.
(My heart feels so warm right now...\nAm I just relieved to find something about\nFather that hasn't changed since then?)
Hmm? There seems to be quite the\ncommotion outside.
We've got fiends coming from the north!\nRun, all of you! Run for the hills!
What happened to the town watch?
The entire force is taking them on, but\nthey say the best we can hope for is that\nthey buy us some time. Now come on—
Understood. We'll lend our aid.\nSheila, let's split up and assist from two\nsides. Agreed?
Wait, you're what?!\nAnnnd they're already gone.\nThose two are FAST...
By the goddess... It's a slaughter!
I have to protect Nico... Move, feet! Move!\nDammit, why can't I—AAAAAAAH!
Easy, Nico. It's all right now. Sheila took\ncare of those nasty fiends for us, so you\ndon't have to cry anymore.
Gya! He's just getting more worked up!
If you stop crying, your daddy will give\nyou candy. Now dry your tears.
As do we all, you courageous little thing.\nIgnacio, please make sure you give\nyour brave son some candy later.
I will, I swear. And thank you so much,\nLady Sheila. You saved us.
I can't believe I froze when my own son\nwas in danger... It seems I'm still as big\na craven as ever I was.
Meanwhile, you're as amazing as ever!\nI can't believe you saved me AGAIN!
(I feel that warmth in my heart again...)
(So much has changed, and yet so much\nremains the same. I think realizing that\nfact is starting to make me happy.)
No time relax just yet. You should take\nNico and flee to safely.
Wow, she may seem a bit different now,\nbut she's still the same amazing person.
That's right, Nico! She's super cool—\nand she always has been!
If she sees someone in trouble, she comes\na'running like a hero from a faerie tale!
And while I can't fight the way she does,\nI still hope to be like her someday.
Me too! I wanna fight the bad guys like\nLady Sheila! Hiii-ya!
